text: Adventures of Krosh () is a 1961 Soviet adventure movie directed by Genrikh Oganisyan.Российский кинорежиссер Никита Михалков. ДосьеПРИКЛЮЧЕНИЯ КРОША It stars Nikolai Tomashevsky, Andrei Yurenyov, and Nikita Mikhalkov. == Actors == * Nikolai Tomashevsky as Krosh * Andrei Yurenyov as Igor * Nikita Mikhalkov as Vadim * I. Pogrebenko as Shmakov * V. Beliakova as Maika * E. Loginova as Nadya == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1961 adventure movies Category:Soviet adventure movies
title: Adventures of Krosh
